text:
="preserve">Wladimir Yordanoff (; 28 March 1954 – 6 October 2020) was a Monégasque-born French actor. He appeared in more than sixty movies since 1979. He was born in Monaco. His best known roles were in "Vincent & Theo", "Mark of an Angel" and in "An Officer and a Spy".
Yordanoff died on 6 October 2020 in Normandy, France, aged 66.
